reviews.review:
I am fairly new to this game, but I can tell you that this game is very fun to play whether you're playing it solo online or with friends. What I love personally about this game is that I can play as killers from 70s and 80s slasher movies (Myers and Leatherface).

This game offers you tons of different survivors and killers to play with and all of them have different play styles. There are lots of perks to use and have different abilities to boost your gameplay. This game also offers free maps to play, so don't worry if you are not planning to buy any of the DLCs from this game.

This game is not perfect by any means, there are still tons of bugs, lots of unbalance perks, and I have come across many cheaters in this game. But, I believe the developers are working hard to try fixing those issues.

Nonetheless, it's still a very fun game.

这游戏不像手游是团队型胜利方式，你被挂树死了跑三个你一样也是失败，但念在都是人类的份上请心存善念，剩一两个机器时，不论救不救你，只要不挣扎，牵制住屠夫，剩下的队友起码都能修好机器打开大门，你直接挣扎加不抵抗，上树秒死，真的让人心寒。当鬼挂人几乎从来没见过秒死的，都给队友争取时间，害得我守也不是不守也不是，当人总有那么几把关键时刻，队友放弃挣扎，上钩就死。还有，以我七十多小时的时间总结了个经验，队友上树或是偷电时，你被鬼追请往远处跑，把鬼拉开，现在的情况多是在树附近各种绕圈，鬼几乎走不远，最后给你砍躺在树前，你在树下趴着，树上还挂一个，叫我们怎么救？
한지 10시간도 안됐는데 고인물 만나고 캠핑하는데 캠핑좀 죽여주세요 시발 무서워서 갈수가없어 / 종프린트 ㅈ 씨~qkf 닥터 캐삭좀  버그 ㅈ 갗ㅌ아아아 너스 시1팔 너프좀 돌진 공격 거리가 무슨 루피 고무 펀치 마냥 존나 기네 너스 너프해 메튜년아 왜 다른 창 틀고있으면 무한로딩이 처 걸려 ㅈ망겜 근데 재밌어서 못끊겠다

I've played for 0.8 h and i already love it. Great game i suggest you get it now when it's on sale or  buy the normal version for 20€

first thing, this is NOT a horror/slasher simulaton
dbd is a asyncronous multiplayer with a mix of lovecraftian mythos + slasher horror movies on top to give flavour
if you are here searching for a "omg this gonna be so scary!" type of game, dbd is not the game for you

now, if like me you are a horror fan, welcome
this game is one of a kind game, i'v always wanted a multiplayer horror experience but it looks like most ppl have this dumb notion that horror should always be about the boos and scares... anyways, how the game works:

killers: basically the killer role is a time menagement, he chases the survivors to hook and sacrifice then, the game have a very refined game design so is a little bit hard for untrained eyes to look in the "in betweens" thats why it frustrate most players that don't like to read info or hate to change their meta/perks. 
My tips to new killers: 
-don't camp the hooked survivor, it wastes your time and it may work with some survivors but it will not work with veteran players.
-put pressure on gens and use perks to counter gen rush
-pay attention to your add-ons and try to "combo" then with your perks
-don't be afraid of SWF(survive with friends) they play on a very autruistic way so they will try to make the 4 survive, unless you camp, then they will tell their mates and you will get 1~2 kills if you are lucky(or laggy)
-experiment with other perks combination, don't just watch you favorite dbd youtuber and say "off course, this perks are so OP..." and copy that loadout, pay attention to WHY is working and how the gameplay is unfolding
-waste that decisive strike early on the match
-if the chase is taking too long, find anoother survivor on the gens (remember, gens rush is your worst enemy)
-use headphones with a good audio
-play as survivor too, you need to think as your prey


Survivors: survivor role is a resource menagement, some may thing that survivor is easier to play than killer, but the team work factor is what acctually weights(matches with randoms have a very low chance of survival), if you play with good teamates the survival chance is high, but the killer can counter weight with memento moris(kill a survivor on the ground) and insta downs add-ons
My tips for new survivors:
-do gens
-open claudette perks, self care specially
-use at least one running perk(balanced landing or sprint burst)
-do gens
-pray for the killer not be the nurse
-stay calm and do gens
-have in mind that most of your actions make noise and alert the killer
-if you have less than 100h in this game, use claudette, she is the most stealth and hard to spot
-play as a killer, most good "survivor main" acctually play as killer too and this give you a great advantage of perspective over ppl who only play one role
-don't stay still on the same spot for too long or reavens will pocke you head
-and... do gens
Nice

The game was amazing at start when i bought it, after long months after grinding in this game the 2.0.0 update came. It runied the whole scheme of out runing the killer, and many other annoying fixes for example when coming to drop  the palate, now it is more killer friendly. Ever since the update has arrived it is more focused on killer than the surrvivors it was perfect the way it was, as both killer and surviviors were easy to play and fair on both side. Now it is not. However for those who do want to play the game and give it a try, the game it self has a good concept to it. I hope that someday the devolpers of this game actually fix this.

Before I get into anything to big let me get this out of the way, if you want to understand this games flaws look at the comment by The Sacred Voice. That being said, I love this game even with the flaws it has, maybe that isnt because I havent logged enough time into it yet but the flaws and the marginally toxic community cannot really get to you if you play with a 4 stack of friends and go at it, but one thing that I can complain about a little is the match making system. Nothing sucks more than just starting dead by daylight and going up against a killer who is running some of the best perks in the game, while you a lowly level 5 Claudette only have the perk slippery meat. However if you can see past all of the flaws you can see a game that the dev's actually put time and effort into crafting for a fun long running gaming experience. So if you find this comment even remotely persuasive I say give the game a shot and if you dont enjoy the game then refund it and buy somthing else. At the end of the day I know its your money so just do what you want.

Nice game

The biggest problem with this game is someone fired all the devs. Survivor is not fun to play and neither is killer the game has so many problems, and if you don't like the game then you should go play Civ 5. The only viable killers are Nurse and No one else. Hillbilly is good if the survivors dont understand how to loop and Huntress has specific counter play just for her that when you learn to master, she will never hit you again unless her hitbox bugs out (and because their are no good devs happens all the time). To top it off they think killers are in a good spot so good luck killer buffs. Honestly they need to hire some smart people to fix the game because with the release of the clown someone needs to be let go. Surviving is fun as of right now because of the pallet bugs. The changes are fine if they were working as intended but they aren't. In order to stun the killer you need to teleport to the correct position then pull the pallet down, while this only takes maybe 2 frames normally, with lag I've been in that animation for upwards of 30 watching myself do nothing. Whether you believe in the devs or not the game has been in a really bad spot and continues to stay like that with no light at the end of the tunnel. Clown's release was absolute trash, his slow is 15% and lasts for 2 seconds AFTER you've already left the smoke. So looping him is impossible, if you go to most of the pallets in the game you just die. I get it they want to reduce looping but this makes the game extremely unfun when you stun a killer, he doesn't break the pallet, and what would normally be a 20 second loop turns into a down in 5 seconds. That is not rewarding gameplay and I'm not saying that killer is fun but I don't want either roles to feel like they got hit because they didn't know how strong 15% is. Also the smoke causes your screen to freak out which isn't bad and I like that part, but because they decided to put a crosshair in the middle of your screen so your still able to flashlight stun the killer making this mechnic useless. Vaults, unhooks, pallet drops, basically every action in the game feels like it was coded by monkeys. Medium vaults is a stupid mechnic no matter how you slice it and because of the devs not paying their good employees you get this even though you hit the window dead on. I want them to take this mechanic completely out or change it and just rework stuff around this, this change feels like a bandage easy change to a much bigger problem of all the maps RNGing into favour for killers or survivors and again neither feels fun.  My last big problem with the game is the way killer hitting works, they said that auto aim isn't in but left click with a killer feels like it shouldn't hit when it does. I want to see the range of the attack shortened to what it actually looks like not being hit when they swing at air would feel nice, as well as if I hold left click then I should go into a survivor not stop and hit them like it does currently. Add some difficulty to the game that makes it feel nice to hit someone and not like the game did it for me. Or change it so if you do that into a locker or wall then it also stops on those objects the same as survivors. Sorry for the long rant but basically, don't buy this game unless your the type to pick up a game play it for 20 hours then leave it then by all means if you don't think about it or care about it then it's a fun game with a good premise. But if you are thinking about picking this game up and you want to get more than 30 hours of fun out of it then just don't bother, there's no hope in this game anymore. And with DLC being free now no reason to pay for it except in game currency anyway. Cya Thanks for reading and if a dev is reading, sorry about all the comments towards you guys but you have to understand the frustration of the community as well as you guys completely ignoring all top player feedback for this game.
